issue.title: [Gandiva] Remove usages of mutable reference out arguments
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3332](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3332). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I have noticed several usages of mutable reference out arguments, e.g. gandiva/regex_util.h. We should change these to conform to the style guide (out arguments as pointers)
